channel.title: PS54AV – Prada Sport Designer Glasses for Men
channel.description: Milan, 1913. A man by the name of Mario Prada started a small leathergoods shop with his brother, Martino, specialising in ladies handbags and English steamer trunks. The company was eventually handed down to Mario’s granddaughter, Miuccia. In 1977 she met her future business partner, Patrizio Bertelli, who advised her on how to expand the [...]
